# Vector Embeddings

Vector embeddings are dense vector representations that capture semantic meaning in a high-dimensional space.

## Technical Details

```python
import numpy as np

def cosine_similarity(vec1, vec2):
    return np.dot(vec1, vec2) / (np.linalg.norm(vec1) * np.linalg.norm(vec2))
```

Modern embedding models like OpenAI's text-embedding-3-large can create 1536-dimensional vectors that encode rich semantic information about text content.
